contents.content: 第一部分 动词
第五章 非谓语动词
第四节 真题分析
一、雅思阅读真题分析40例
（一）不定式
Example 1

真题回放：However, some important sites in Gujarat have recently undergone major restoration, and the state government announced in June last year that it plans to restore the stepwells throughout the state. （剑10阅读）

contents.title: 电视让观众了解最新的国内外新闻。
contents.answer: ：TVs keep audience well informed about the latest news home and abroad.

contents.content: 语法破解：and前是一个简单句。and后是一个主从复合句；that引导的是宾语从句，该从句中的to restore是不定式的一般式，作plans的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：However, the lack of measures available to revitalise other modes of transport would make it impossible for more sustainable modes of transport to take up the baton.（剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，to revitalise other modes of transport是不定式短语作后置定语，修饰measures，it是形式宾语，for more sustainable modes of transport to take up the baton是“for+名词+不定式”结构，是真正的宾语。
Example 3
真题回放：They may feel like outsiders and want to speak the local language, but it is more important for the child's language development to provide a lot of language experience in any language. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是由but连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。在but前的句子中，to speak是不定式的一般式，作want的宾语；在but后的句子中，it是形式主语，to provide a lot of language experience in any language是不定式短语，是句子的真正主语。
Example 4
真题回放：Tens of millions of people have been forced to move from their homes—often with little warning or compensation—to make way for the reservoirs behind dams. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，to move是不定式的一般式，作主语补足语，Tens of millions of people是这个不定式的逻辑主语，to make way也是不定式的一般式，作目的状语。
Example 5
真题回放：People have figured out how to use water more efficiently and communities are rethinking their priorities for water use. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。how to use为“疑问词+不定式”结构，作figured out的宾语。
Example 6
真题回放：They are backed up by technicians who design instruments to collect data from athletes. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。who引导的是定语从句，修饰technicians；to collect data是不定式的一般式，作目的状语。
Example 7
真题回放：The results of a 14-year study to be announced later this month reveal that the diseases associated with old age are afflicting fewer and fewer people. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的to be announced是不定式一般式的被动语态，作后置定语，修饰the results；that引导的是宾语从句，作动词reveal的宾语。
Example 8
真题回放：Professor Peter Newman, ISTP Director, pointed out that these more efficient cities were able to put the difference into attracting industry and jobs or creating a better place to live. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作pointed out的宾语；to live是不及物动词的不定式，作后置定语，修饰place，此时不定式后面省略了介词in。
Example 9
真题回放：Only limited attention appears to have been given to those students experiencing the other disabilities involving auditory function deficit. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，to have been given是不定式完成式的被动语态，作表语，appears是半系动词。
Example 10
真题回放：To demonstrate how the system works, Bruce Mason at AIS shows off the prototype of a 3D analysis tool for studying swimmers. （剑6阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，To demonstrate how the system works是不定式的一般式，作目的状语。
（二）动名词
Example 1

真题回放：During the sixth and seventh centuries, the inhabitants of the modern-day states of Gujarat and Rajasthan in north-western India developed a method of gaining access to clean, fresh groundwater during the dry season for drinking, bathing, watering animals and irrigation. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，gaining access to clean, fresh groundwater 是动名词短语,作介词of的宾语，drinking, bathing, watering animals是三个并列的动名词（短语），作介词for的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：Using alternative fuels and improving energy efficiency is thus both an ecological necessity and a technological challenge. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，Using alternative fuels and improving energy efficiency是动名词短语作主语。
Example 3
真题回放：Educating Psyche by Bernie Neville is a book which looks at radical new approaches to learning, describing three effects of emotion, imagination and the unconscious on learning. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Educating Psyche是动名词短语，作主句的主语；which引导的是定语从句，修饰a book；两个learning都是动名词，分别作介词to和on的宾语。
Example 4
真题回放：It has now reached a point where a growing number of people believe that it is far too high, and that bringing it down will be one of the great challenges of the twenty first century. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。where引导的是定语从句，修饰a point；该从句本身又是一个主从复合句，两个that引导的都是宾语从句，作动词believe的宾语。bringing it down是动名词短语作主语。
Example 5
真题回放：Autism does not allow learning or thinking in the same ways as in children who are developing normally. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。learning和thinking是动名词，作allow的宾语；who引导的是定语从句，修饰children。
Example 6
真题回放：In addition, young children enjoy looking in mirrors, where the movements they can see are dependent upon their own movements. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。looking是动名词，作enjoy的宾语；where引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰in mirrors；该从句中的they can see又是一个省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰the movements。
Example 7
真题回放：Simon Hewson is cited as having demonstrated that earlier experiments into children's ability to reason deductively may have led to the wrong conclusions. （剑2阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。having demonstrated是动名词的完成式，作主语Simon Hewson的补足语。that 引导的是宾语从句，作动词demonstrated的宾语。
Example 8

真题回放：The WZCS estimates that there are about 10,000 zoos in the world, of which around l,000 represent a core of quality collections capable of participating in co-ordinated conservation programmes. （剑1阅读）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句；该从句中又包含一个由of which引导的非限制性定语从句，修饰10,000 zoos, participating in co-ordinated conservation programmes是动名词短语，作介词of的宾语。
Example 9

真题回放：As the United Nations report on access to water reiterated in November 2001, more than one billion people lack access to clean drinking water; some two and a half billion do not have adequate sanitation services. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，As引导的是非限制性定语从句。drinking是动名词作定语，修饰water，表示water的具体用途。
Example 10
真题回放：Architecture is the art and science of designing buildings and structures. （剑1阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，designing buildings and structures是动名词短语，作介词of的宾语。
（三）现在分词
Example 1

真题回放：But perhaps the most impressive features are the intricate decorative sculptures that embellish many stepwells, showing activities from fighting and dancing to everyday acts such as women combing their hair or churning butter. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句，that引导的是定语从句，修饰sculptures。主句中的showing activities是现在分词短语作伴随状语；combing their hair和churning butter都是现在分词短语作后置定语，修饰women。
Example 2
真题回放：For passenger transport, the determining factor is the spectacular growth in car use.（剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，determining是现在分词作定语，修饰factor。
Example 3
真题回放：Realising the importance of this breakthrough, he lost no time in patenting it. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，Realising the importance of this breakthrough是现在分词短语，作时间状语。
Example 4
真题回放：And even in regions where new projects seem warranted, we must find ways to meet demands with fewer resources, respecting ecological criteria and to a smaller budget. （剑7阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。where引导的是定语从句，修饰regions；主句中的respecting ecological criteria是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 5
真题回放：To eke out a full-time living from their honeybees, about half the nation's 2,000 commercial beekeepers pull up stakes each spring, migrating north to find more flowers for their bees. （剑1阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，migrating north to find more flowers for their bees是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 6
真题回放：The motion of a pendulum rocks this device so that it catches and then releases each tooth of the escape wheel, in turn allowing it to turn a precise amount. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。so that引导的是目的状语从句。allowing it to turn a precise amount是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 7

真题回放：As early as the 1920s, the earliest air traffic controllers manually guided aircraft in the vicinity of the airports, using lights and flags, while beacons and flashing lights were placed along cross-country routes to establish the earliest airways. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的using lights and flags是现在分词短语，作方式状语；while引导的是时间状语从句，flashing是现在分词作定语，修饰lights。
Example 8
真题回放：Many people think that ATC consists of a row of controllers sitting in front of their radar screens at the nation's airports, telling arriving and departing traffic what to do. （剑8阅读）

语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，sitting in front of their radar screens是现在分词短语，作后置定语，修饰controllers；telling arriving and departing traffic what to do是现在分词短语，作伴随状语；其中的arriving and departing是现在分词，作定语，修饰traffic。
Example 9
真题回放：To stop the laser itself being struck, it would not be pointed straight at the clouds. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，being struck是现在分词的被动语态，作宾语laser的补足语。
Example 10

真题回放：Utilising the cheap and plentiful coal tar that was an almost unlimited byproduct of London's gas street lighting, the dye works began producing the world's first synthetically dyed material in 1857. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的Utilising the cheap and plentiful coal tar是现在分词短语，作原因状语；that引导的是定语从句，修饰coal tar。
（四）过去分词
Example 1
真题回放：Built from stone and supported by pillars, they also included pavilions that sheltered visitors from the relentless heat. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的Built from stone and supported by pillars是过去分词短语，作方式状语；that引导的是定语从句，修饰pavilions。
Example 2
真题回放：The strong economic growth expected in countries which are candidates for entry to the EU will also increase transport flows, in particular road haulage traffic. （剑10阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的expected in countries是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰The strong economic growth；which引导的是定语从句，修饰countries。
Example 3

真题回放：His talent and devotion to the subject were perceived by his teacher, Thomas Hall, who encouraged him to attend a series of lectures given by the eminent scientist Michael Faraday at the Royal Institution. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。who引导的是非限制性定语从句，修饰Thomas Hall；given by the eminent scientist Michael Faraday是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰lectures。
Example 4
真题回放：To early man, fire was a divine gift randomly delivered in the form of lightning, forest fire or burning lava. （剑1阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，delivered in the form of lightning, forest fire or burning lava是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰gift。
Example 5
真题回放：We do not even know, for example, how many stars have planets, and we certainly do not know how likely it is that life will arise naturally, given the right conditions. （剑9阅读）

语法破解：and前是一个主从复合句，how many引导的是宾语从句，作动词know的宾语。and后是一个多重主从复合句，how引导的是宾语从句，作动词know的宾语；该宾语从句本身又是一个部分倒装结构的主从复合句，正常语序应该是it is how likely that…；其中的it是形式主语，that引导的是主语从句，given the right conditions是过去分词短语，作条件状语。
Example 6

真题回放：Inspired by Halley's suggestion of a way to pin down the scale of the Solar System, teams of British and French astronomers set out on expeditions to places as diverse as India and Siberia. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，Inspired by Halley's suggestion of a way to pin down the scale of the Solar System是过去分词短语，作原因状语。
Example 7
真题回放：In general, from 365m above the ground and higher, the entire country is blanketed by controlled airspace. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，controlled是过去分词，作定语，修饰airspace。
Example 8
真题回放：Those experiencing these disorders often find sounds such as crowd noise and the noise generated by machinery painful and distressing. （剑9阅读）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，generated by machinery是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰the noise。
Example 9

真题回放：In the 1940s, ATC centres could and did take advantage of the newly developed radar and improved radio communication brought about by the Second World War, but the system remained rudimentary. （剑8阅读）

语法破解：这是由but连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。developed是过去分词作定语，修饰radar；improved也是过去分词作定语，修饰radio communication；brought about by the Second World War是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰the newly developed radar and improved radio communication。
Example 10

真题回放：Only two centuries ago, Europe experienced a cycle of bitterly cold winters; mountain glaciers in the Swiss Alps were the lowest in recorded memory, and pack ice surrounded Iceland for much of the year. （剑8阅读）
语法破解：这是由分号和and连接的三个简单句组成的并列句。recorded是过去分词作定语，修饰memory。
二、雅思听力真题分析40例
（一）不定式
Example 1
真题回放：It's very important to do this because we really do want to avoid having any sports injuries. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的It是形式主语，to do this是不定式短语，是真正的主语；because引导的是原因状语从句，to avoid是不定式作want的宾语。
Example 2
真题回放：Each member is given full training in how to operate the equipment and there is always a trainer on duty to offer help and advice. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。how to operate the equipment是“疑问词+不定式短语”，作介词in的宾语；to offer help and advice是不定式短语，作目的状语。
Example 3
真题回放：However, when teachers help pupils to reflect on their own learning and thinking activities, they increase their pupils' self-regulation. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。when引导的是时间状语从句，to reflect on their own learning and thinking activities是不定式短语，作宾语pupils的补足语。
Example 4
真题回放：For students who are doing projects it's useful to make some kind of visual record of what they see that they can add to their reports. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。who引导的是定语从句，修饰students；主句中的it是形式主语，不定式短语to make some kind of visual record是真正的主语；what引导的是宾语从句，作介词of的宾语；that引导的是定语从句，修饰visual record。
Example 5
真题回放：If they haven't got exactly what you want in stock they promise to get it for you in ten days. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个多重主从复合句。If引导的是条件状语从句，该从句中又包含一个由what引导的宾语从句，作动词got的宾语；主句中的to get it是不定式短语，作promise的宾语。
Example 6
真题回放：The shop will be open from 9.00 am this Saturday and if you go along to the opening then you'll have the chance to meet the national 400 metres running champion Paul King. （剑9听力）
语法破解：and前是一个简单句。and后是一个主从复合句，if引导的是条件状语从句；主句中的to meet the national 400 metres running champion Paul King是不定式短语，作the chance的同位语，该不定式短语和the chance是说明关系，即不定式短语是the chance的具体内容。
Example 7
真题回放：And he will be staying around until about midday to chat to any fans who want to meet him and sign autographs. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的to chat是不定式，作目的状语；who引导的是定语从句，修饰fans, to meet是不定式，作want的宾语。
Example 8
真题回放：Well, let me give you some of the basic information first. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个祈使句，let是使役动词，give是省略to的不定式，作宾语me的补足语。
Example 9
真题回放：Also, some of the exhibits are fragile and we don't want them to be accidentally knocked. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。to be…knocked 是不定式一般式的被动语态，作宾语them的补足语。
Example 10
真题回放：So, to give you some idea of what's on, and to help you choose from the many possibilities, we've made a selection of the star attractions. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。what引导的是宾语从句，作介词of的宾语；to give和to help是由and连接的两个并列的不定式，作目的状语；choose是省略了to的不定式，作宾语you的补足语。
（二）动名词
Example 1
真题回放：The logging of the trees along the streams has damaged the places where the bears fish. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的logging of the trees是动名词短语作主语；where引导的是定语从句，修饰places。
Example 2
真题回放：All members must pay a joining fee of ￡90 in addition to the rates for the monthly membership fees. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，joining是动名词作定语，修饰fee。
Example 3
真题回放：One of the special opening offers is a fitness test—a complete review of your cardiac fitness and muscle tone, actually done in the shop by qualified staff. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，opening是动名词作定语，修饰offers。
Example 4
真题回放：They cover all the major sports, including football, tennis and swimming, but they particularly focus on running, and they claim to have the widest range of equipment in the country. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是由but和and连接的三个简单句组成的并列句。swimming是动名词，作介词including的宾语；running也是动名词，作介词on的宾语。
Example 5
真题回放：In fact the swimming pool's already opened, ahead of schedule, and it's attracting a lot of people. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是由and连接的两个简单句组成的并列句。swimming是动名词作定语，修饰pool，表示pool的具体用途。
Example 6
真题回放：I think that having to do a seminar presentation really helped me. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，作动词think的宾语；having to do a seminar presentation是动名词短语，作主语。
Example 7
真题回放：I've had to do so much reading this semester just to help me make sense of the lectures. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，reading是动名词，作do的宾语。
Example 8
真题回放：She usually starts checking the rooms at midday. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句， checking the rooms是动名词短语，作starts的宾语。
Example 9
真题回放：Before we start, Spiros and Hiroko, thanks for coming in today to talk about your recent study experiences and congratulations to you both in doing so well in your first semester exams! （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。Before引导的是时间状语从句；主句是一个省略句，其中的coming in是动名词短语，作介词for的宾语；doing是动名词，作介词in的宾语。
Example 10
真题回放：This may include singing or dancing, mime or other activities. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，singing or dancing是动名词，作may include的宾语。
（三）现在分词
Example 1
真题回放：You are asked to fill in a questionnaire giving details of any health problems. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，giving details of any health problems是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 2

真题回放：We are particularly proud of the work we do in education—last year we visited a huge number of schools in different parts of the country, going round to talk to children and young people aged from five to eighteen. （剑10听力）
语法破解：破折号前是一个主从复合句；we do in education是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰the work。破折号后是一个简单句，going round to talk to children and young people是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 3
真题回放：We have lots of fascinating indoor and outdoor exhibits on our huge complex, spreading hundreds of hectares. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，spreading hundreds of hectares是现在分词短语，作方式状语。
Example 4
真题回放：In the south-eastern corner, beyond the marsh, is our Market Garden area, growing vegetables and flowers. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，growing vegetables and flowers是现在分词短语，作方式状语。
Example 5
真题回放：Green Vale changes with the seasons with different events happening at different times of the year. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，happening at different times of the year是现在分词短语，作后置定语，修饰different events。
Example 6
真题回放：Our son, Duncan, has been a stalwart of the park for the last ten years, taking over from me in the area of construction. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，taking over from me in the area of construction是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 7
真题回放：I found computer modelling fascinating—I have no problem following what's being taught, whereas quite a few of my classmates find it difficult. （剑9听力）
语法破解：破折号前是一个简单句，found是感观动词，fascinating是现在分词，作宾语补足语。破折号和逗号之间是一个主从复合句，what引导的是宾语从句，作following的宾语。whereas后是一个简单句。
Example 8
真题回放：And, as you know, this is very damaging to the environment. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。as引导的是非限制性定语从句，主句中的damaging是现在分词，作表语。
Example 9
真题回放：People we've heard from are mainly worried about traffic in the area, and, in particular, the increasing speed of cars near school. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。we've heard from 是省略了引导词that的定语从句，修饰People；主句中的increasing是现在分词，作定语，修饰speed。
Example 10
真题回放：Garden ponds are on the increase, while rural ponds are disappearing, leading to massive migration to the towns. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是由while连接的两个简单句组成的并列句，leading to massive migration to the towns是现在分词短语，作结果状语。
（四）过去分词
Example 1
真题回放：Our recently refurbished fitness suite has all the latest exercise equipment including ten new running machines, and a wide range of weight-training machines. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，refurbished是过去分词作定语，修饰fitness suite。
Example 2
真题回放：The predominant style of management will almost certainly become more consultative and collaborative, caused above all, by more women moving into senior management positions. （剑10听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，caused above all, by more women moving into senior management positions是过去分词短语，作结果状语。
Example 3
真题回放：The local people are trying to get a new cinema added to the scheme. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，get是使役动词，added to the scheme是过去分词短语，作宾语补足语。
Example 4
真题回放：You can book a guided tour for your school group any time that we're open. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的guided是过去分词作定语，修饰tour；that引导的是定语从句，修饰any time。
Example 5
真题回放：Each day kicks off a sports match, perhaps football, or volleyball, followed by an hour of drama for everyone. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，followed by an hour of drama for everyone是过去分词短语，作方式状语。
Example 6
真题回放：If you want to eat there you'll need to reserve some seating, as they can get quite crowded at lunch time. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。If引导的是条件状语从句；as引导的是原因状语从句，crowded是过去分词作表语，这里的get是半系动词。
Example 7
真题回放：The single largest problem faced by people who manage the sites is—yes, I'm sure you've guessed—damage caused by visitors, even though it's usually unintentional. （剑7听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的faced by people是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰problem；who引导的是定语从句，修饰people, caused by visitors是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰damage；yes, I'm sure you've guessed是插入语；even though引导的是让步状语从句。
Example 8
真题回放：Well, as I'm combining Spanish with Latin American studies, my main idea was to find out more about the way people lived there. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。as引导的是时间状语从句；主句中的lived there是过去分词短语作后置定语，修饰people。
Example 9
真题回放：Meanwhile, we were doing our own observations in selected gardens throughout the city. （剑9听力）
语法破解：这是一个简单句，selected是过去分词作定语，修饰gardens。
Example 10
真题回放：You can easily illustrate areas of diseased trees or how much traffic is on the roads at a given time or information about deep sea beds, for example. （剑8听力）
语法破解：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的diseased是过去分词作定语，修饰trees；how much引导的是宾语从句，作动词illustrate的宾语，given是过去分词作定语，修饰time。
三、雅思写作和口语中的非谓语动词
非谓语动词在雅思阅读文章和听力材料中非常普遍，但很多考生在雅思写作和口语中却忽略了这种用法。实际上，用好非谓语动词不仅仅能使句子显得更为地道和精练，并且在语法方面还能加分。
请看下面的句子。
Smoking is an addictive menace, posing a health hazard not only for smokers but also for people surrounding them. 吸烟是一种令人上瘾的恶习，不仅对吸烟者的健康构成威胁，同时也会危及他们周围的人。
该句虽然是一个简单句，但由于使用了非谓语动词，因此内容丰富，是个很好的加分句型。其中的Smoking是动名词，作主语，posing a health hazard是现在分词短语，作结果状语，surrounding them是现在分词短语，作后置定语，修饰people。
非谓语动词不能作谓语，作同位语的用法也很少，下面总结的非谓语动词在雅思写作和口语中的用法和例句考生会觉得比较轻松而且能够记住。
1. 主语
注：不定式和动名词均可以充当句子的主语，可以避免人称如people，we等频繁作主语的情况。
点评：这是一个主从复合句。that引导的是宾语从句，该从句中的to send their children to kindergartens or nursery schools是不定式短语，作主语。该句常用于写作、口语的“家庭类和教育类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，It 是形式主语，真正的主语是不定式短语to have a break from studying after graduating from high school。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类和工作类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，Living in school是动名词短语，作主语。该句常用于写作、口语的“校园生活类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，Sitting in front of a screen for too long是动名词短语，作主语。该句常用于写作、口语的“健康类和生活类”话题中。
点评：这是一个主从复合句。主句中的Spending time with other children是动名词短语，作主语，注意谓语动词要用单数形式；that引导的是定语从句，修饰an important part。该句常用于写作、口语的“科技类和生活类”话题中。
2. 宾语
点评：这是一个简单句，to take outdoor exercises是不定式短语，作动词prefer的宾语。该句常用于写作、口语的“生活类和爱好类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，smoking in public是动名词短语，作object to的宾语。该句常用于写作、口语的“生活类和爱好类”话题中。
3. 状语
点评：这是一个简单句，to reduce the increasing gap是不定式短语，作目的状语。该句常用于写作、口语的“政府类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，enjoying the great benefits是现在分词短语，作让步状语。该句常用于写作、口语的“科技类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，influenced by excessive violence是过去分词短语，作原因状语。该句常用于写作、口语的“生活类和教育类”话题中。
4. 定语
注：非谓语动词充当定语能够减少定语从句的使用，减少累赘的句子成分，使句子更为精练。
点评：这是一个简单句，majoring in Foreign Trade是现在分词短语，作后置定语，修饰a student。该句常用于口语Part I中的自我介绍。
点评：这是一个简单句，going abroad是现在分词短语，作后置定语，修饰students。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，obtained from part-time job是过去分词短语，作后置定语，修饰The extra money。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类和工作类”话题中。
5. 表语
点评：这是一个简单句，to pursue the higher degree in foreign countries是不定式短语，作表语。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，misleading and cheating是现在分词短语，作表语。该句常用于写作、口语的“媒体类”话题中。
6. 补语
点评：这是一个简单句，to stay with their children less and less是不定式短语，作宾语补足语。该句常用于写作、口语的“教育类和生活类”话题中。
点评：这是一个简单句，keep是使役动词，informed是过去分词，作宾语补足语。该句常用于写作、口语的“科技类和媒体类”话题中。
